Package schedulemanager.controller

Class ScheduleController

java.lang.Object
schedulemanager.controller.ScheduleController
public class ScheduleController extends Object
Controller that coordinates between the UI and service layers.

This controller handles user actions from the UI and delegates to appropriate services, ensuring proper separation of concerns.
